title: 2nd Years’ Date!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>It’s refreshing for the 4 of us to hang out together! Lanzhu will treat you all through today, so look forward to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uwaah, that sounds fun! Ai wonders what we’ll do~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>First, we’re going to rent out my mom’s favorite restaurant. They make delicious egg tarts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Rent out!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>After that, we’re getting a chauffeur. We can drive anywhere we want.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>What’s a chauffeur?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uhh.... Lanzhu. We’re happy that you’re doing all these things to treat us, but it might be a little bit too much.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eh? Really? Then what should Lanzhu do? Ah, how about we rent out a hotel? We can use the restaurant and the spa as much as we want that way!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Umm.... I would love to visit your room, Lanzhu-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Me too! It would be great to chat or play games with everyone there. I’ve also prepared some cookies to snack on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Eeeh!? My room!? Do you really want to go there....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Yeah, we want to play in your room!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>O-, okay! Give me 15 minutes. Lanzhu will clean it up right away. Lanzhu didn’t know what to wear today, so my clothes were just scattered all over. Let me at least clean those up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
